name: Auto Grotto
description: This is a game made for the Juice Jam 2022. One day, a knight wanders into a mysterious crystal cave with bizzare powers. Suddenly, he is forced to not stop moving as the beings of the cave are drawn to his crystal sword. However, once he tried to leave, he came out the other side of the cave's walls! You must now survive as long as possible by slaying the creatures & maneuvering yourself carefully throughout the cave to avoid a glowing demise. Font is ThaleahFat by Tiny Worlds, & music is "8-bit Caves Music Loop" by Crossedkiller.
